hiringMixer.title: Jobs from our Sponsors
hiringMixer.subtext: Our sponsors are not only on the cutting edge of web development -- they also provide unique and interesting solutions to various problems in our society. Join one of the teams from our sponsors to change the world for the better.

jobListings.noJobsSubtext: Many of our sponsors are hiring. Their job listings will show up here in the next few weeks.

jobs.title: UI Developer
jobs.description: At Replay.io, we're building the first time-travel debugger for the modern web so you can record, replay, and collaboratively debug your application after the fact. As UI Developer, you'll be responsible for making the UI more approachable and bringing the time-travel magic to life.

jobs.title: Developer Advocate
jobs.description: Are you a techie fond of Open Source and developer experience? Developers are a crucial part of our customers’ teams, and we want them to take full advantage of our platform. You will be the one they turn to. You will: Work with multiple web technologies, share your knowledge through tech articles and tutorials, attend conferences to learn and bring innovation, cooperate with the development team, mainly on the API architecture.
